t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands. Exclusive brand items are third party offerings sold exclusively through Amazon. Some of Amazon's store brands require an Amazon Prime membership to purchase.

t: When buying online, do you prefer to use eBay or Amazon? Why? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 16): It all depends on what I am looking for. I start on Amazon usually to see what is available, how much the median price for the item I'm looking to buy is and what kind of ratings the product gets. Then I go to eBay to try to compare quality, price and to see if someone may have ...
